seisflows3.tests.test_modules

General test suite for all SeisFlows3 modules. Defines required parameters and functions for each of the modules, tests importing each of the modules and that each of the required parameters and functions exist. A sort of first-pass test which makes sure the package is set up correctly.

Module Contents

Functions

copy_par_file(tmpdir)

Copy the template parameter file into the temporary test directory

sfinit(tmpdir, copy_par_file)

Re-used function that will initate a SeisFlows3 working environment in

test_import(sfinit)

Test code by importing all available classes for this module.

test_required_parameters_exist(sfinit)

Ensure that the required parameters are set in all the classes/subclasses

test_required_functions_exist(sfinit)

Make sure that the named, required functions exist within the class

test_setup(sfinit, modules)

Test the expected behavior of each of the rqeuired functions.

seisflows3.tests.test_modules.required_structure

seisflows3.tests.test_modules.copy_par_file(tmpdir)

Copy the template parameter file into the temporary test directory :rtype: str :return: location of the parameter file

seisflows3.tests.test_modules.sfinit(tmpdir, copy_par_file)

Re-used function that will initate a SeisFlows3 working environment in sys modules :return:

seisflows3.tests.test_modules.test_import(sfinit)

Test code by importing all available classes for this module. If any of these fails then the module itself has some code error (e.g., syntax errors, inheritance errors).

seisflows3.tests.test_modules.test_required_parameters_exist(sfinit)

Ensure that the required parameters are set in all the classes/subclasses That is, that the parameters defined above in REQUIRED_PARAMETERS have been defined by each SYSTEM class

seisflows3.tests.test_modules.test_required_functions_exist(sfinit)

Make sure that the named, required functions exist within the class Do not execute just make sure they’re defined, because they will be expected by other modules

seisflows3.tests.test_modules.test_setup(sfinit, modules)

Test the expected behavior of each of the rqeuired functions.

Setup: make sure that setup creates the necessary directory structure

  • modules –
